SensorModel Class Referenceabstract

Defiens a SensorModel to be used in the ParticleFilter. This is used in the update step to revise the filter's belief. More...

#include <sensorModel.h>

Inheritance diagram for SensorModel:

Public Member Functions

virtual std::optional< double > p (const Eigen::Vector3f &x)=0
 Determine p(z_k, x_k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z_k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x_k).
 
virtual void update ()=0
 Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (~10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame.
 

Detailed Description

Defiens a SensorModel to be used in the ParticleFilter. This is used in the update step to revise the filter's belief.

Member Function Documentation

◆ p()

virtual std::optional< double > SensorModel::p ( const Eigen::Vector3f & x)
pure virtual

Determine p(z_k, x_k). This is the chance that this sensor reading (z_k) would occur given the robot would be at that particle (x_k).

Parameters
xThe current particle's position
Returns
Result of p(z_k, x_k)

Implemented in DistanceSensorModel, GpsSensorModel, and LineSensorModel.

◆ update()

virtual void SensorModel::update ( )
pure virtual

Update object with sensor readings, this function is called every frame (~10ms) and should be used to stash expensive, one time computations before all the particles are calculated, this always runs before p(x) each frame.

Implemented in DistanceSensorModel, GpsSensorModel, and LineSensorModel.
